thread.title: Football: Egypt into Africa Cup of Nations final
thread.title_full: Football: Egypt into Africa Cup of Nations final

title: Football: Egypt into Africa Cup of Nations final
text:
By AFP   07:46 Goalkeeper Essam El Hadary saved two penalties [PHOTO: COURTESY] 
Egypt won through to the Africa Cup of Nations final on Wednesday after beating Burkina Faso 4-3 on penalties in the semi-final. 
The match in Libreville ended 1-1 after 90 minutes and extra time, with Mohamed Salah's 66th-minute opener for Egypt cancelled out by Aristide Bance seven minutes later. Egypt vs Burkina Faso 1-1 HD All Goals & Highlights 

With no further scoring it went to a shoot-out where Essam El Hadary's save from Bertrand Traore's last kick for Burkina Faso gave Egypt the victory. 
They will play either Ghana or Cameroon in Sunday's final.
